welcome_message_title: Welcome to Koog aan de Zaan
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Koog aan de Zaan, a charming city known for its beautiful windmills and traditional Dutch architecture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 4 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
